name: Into the Depths (TheGameOverGuy)
description:
Ludum Dare April 2022 - "Delay the Inventible":

My submission for the Ludum Dare Game Jam!

This is Skelly

He needs to get food for the winter, but his food only grows down in the depths of the earth. The deeper Skelly goes, the bigger the depths get...

Skelly needs to delay his family's demise and gather food, but he also needs to delay his torch from going out before he can get the required amount of food.

Gather torches to stay alive! Gather blue mushrooms to survive the winter.

Help Skelly!

Navigate through the maze of the depths...

Find torches to help Skelly stay alive...

Find mushrooms to help Skelly's family survive...

Don't let his torch die...
